title: Education Cannot Wait Interviews Amina J. Mohammed, Deputy Secretary-general of the United Nations | Education Cannot Wait

quotes: Having followed ECW’s work closely since its inception, how do you see ECW contributing to UN reform and the SDGs, especially as we accelerate during the Decade of Action, through concrete measures and results.

Having followed ECW’s work closely since its inception, how do you see ECW contributing to UN reform and the SDGs, especially as we accelerate during the Decade of Action, through concrete measures and results.

time_markers.text: During the unfolding of the COVID-19 pandemic
quotes: During the unfolding of the COVID-19 pandemic, ECW and partners mobilized to provide education support at record speed.

organizations.name: Education Cannot Wait (ECW)
quotes: These approaches and principles are also embedded in the strategy and work of Education Cannot Wait (ECW), which is hosted by the UN (UNICEF).

organizations.name: UN (UNICEF)
quotes: These approaches and principles are also embedded in the strategy and work of Education Cannot Wait (ECW), which is hosted by the UN (UNICEF).

roles.title: UN Secretary-General
quotes: The UN Secretary-General’s Reform places strong emphasis on ‘The New Way of Working,’ the ‘humanitarian-development coherence’ and the principles of ‘less bureaucracy and more accountability.’
